titleStmt.title: A narrative of the proceedings and tryal of Mr. Francis Johnson, a Franciscan, at Worcester last summer-assizes Anno Dom. 1679 written with his own hand as followeth.
titleStmt.author: Wall, John, Saint, 1620-1679.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard Law School Library.
With: Mr. Johnson's speech : which he deliver'd to his friend to be printed (as he mention'd at the place of execution).
